topic.title: How to Perfectly Slice Avocados
topic.shortdesc: Fresh avocados are a great addition to a burrito.

li.p: Grab an avocado from the produce bowl on the counter that is both green and brown.
Cut the avocado perfectly in half.
Lay each half face down, and cut them in slices 1 cm in width.
Put those slices on your plate.

body.p: Keep making the rest of your breakfast!
